SpecRun Documentation
=====================

Please check our website (http://www.specrun.com) for introduction videos and 
upcoming documentation content.

SpecRun supports executing pure NUnit tests too. Please check NUnitSupport.txt
for details. 

In this folder you will find the living documetnation part of SpecRun - the 
automated Gherkin scenarios that have been verified when this package was 
created. We hope they can answer some questions about the product.

If you have any further questions, please contact us at support@specrun.com, or
post to our dicsussion forum: http://groups.google.com/group/specrun.
